mapper.select: select n.notice_no no, n.join_no, n.title, n.content, n.hit, n.reg_date, u.name from users u, join_users j, notice n where n.join_no = j.join_no and j.user_no = u.no

select n.notice_no no, n.join_no, n.title, n.content, n.hit, n.reg_date, u.name from users u, join_users j, notice n where n.join_no = j.join_no and j.user_no = u.no
and title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by reg_date desc

select count(*) from users u, join_users j, notice n where n.join_no = j.join_no and j.user_no = u.no
and title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select join_no
from join_users j, users u where u.no = #{no} and u.no = j.user_no
select n.notice_no no, u.name, n.title, n.content, n.hit, n.reg_date from users u, join_users j, notice n where n.join_no = j.join_no and j.user_no = u.no and notice_no = #{no}
